nodes.text: Sanrec Stronghammer was a male individual who was a pilot of the New Republic's Phantom Squadron. Stronghammer participated in the Battle of Jakku, and after the Galactic Civil War he worked as a security guard for whoever paid. Stronghammer was later recruited by Wedge Antilles to join the Resistance and died during the Resistance's mission to Bracca.
Sanrec Stronghammer first appeared in the 2019 novel Resistance Reborn, written by Rebecca Roanhorse.
